resources.string: You can connect with patients suffering from same disease anonymously . Chat with them through small support groups headed by a professional .
We respect your privacy and only require information to connect you to relevant info . Your date of birth is used only for calculating your age .
I agree to all the terms and conditions .
Tap or Slide on posts to view posts and on threads to view your threads

, We have detected some inappropriate or malicious behaviour associated with your account . To protect our other users we have temporarily disabled your account . Please be patient while we review the matter and come to a conclusion .

Login Failed ! Looks like internet connection is not available at the moment or connection is too poor . You can choose to continue offline however you will not be able to use online features like help and accessing resources etc.
Requested resource is not available at present . We are working continuously to add more knowledge base to our platform . Please check back after some time .
Sent messages cannot be deleted after 30 minutes of delivery . Also messages may have already been read before deletion .
Are you sure you want to delete this message ? It will be deleted from all devices but it may have already been read .
. Messages are no longer available on the device . To join this group again , Click on Join A Group button on the chats page anytime .
Exit group ? This action cannot be reversed . Group messages will no longer be available on your device .
Tap here to attach an image with your message
A new update is available . It is highly recommended to update the app so you can enjoy new features and have a pleasant and seamless experience .
This profile is classified as an active user .
This profile has not been verified yet .
Please upload a document for verification
You must be at least 12 yrs old to continue .
Please agree to Terms and Conditions
File IO Error : Make sure you have given SD Card Permission
Tap here to get more info on a disease
Please select a body part first
Failed : User has been offline for a long time !
Hello ! I want to connect with you over chat .
after the user accepts your message request .
